item.title: Weird errors help please
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i added this in my NPCHandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == 50) { temp.killedKBD += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("KBD kills: "+temp.killedKBD+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 72) { temp.killedMith += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Mith drag kills: "+temp.killedMith+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 742) { temp.killedElvarg += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Elvarg kills: "+temp.killedElvarg+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1115) { temp.killedGraardor += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Graardor kills: "+temp.killedGraardor+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1160) { temp.killedKQ += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("KQ kills: "+temp.killedKQ+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2881) { temp.killedSupreme += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Supreme kills: "+temp.killedSupreme+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2882) { temp.killedPrime += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Prime kills: "+temp.killedPrime+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2883) { temp.killedRex += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Rex kills: "+temp.killedRex+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 3200) { temp.killedEle += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Chaos ele kills: "+temp.killedEle+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2687) { temp.killedPhoenix += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Phoenix kills: "+temp.killedPhoenix+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2692) { temp.killedSanta += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Santa kills: "+temp.killedSanta+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2693) { temp.killedJack += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Jack frost kills: "+temp.killedJack+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2697) { temp.killedCorp += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Corp beast kills: "+temp.killedCorp+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); }
and get errors at this code for some reason

[code] }
}
}
}
}
}
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
if (npcs[NPCID] != null) {
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].IsUnderAttackNpc = false;
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].IsAttackingNPC = false;
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].attacknpc = -1;
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x328;
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
return true;
}
return false;
}

public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
	if (npcs[NPCID] != null) {
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].IsUnderAttack = false;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].StartKilling = 0;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = true;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x328;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
	return true;
	}
	return false;
}

}[/code]
can someone explain whats wrong please?
im using delta source btw
